name: Nuclear_Operators_Utilities
title: Nuclear Operators Utilities
author: max2344
description: Utilities for use in nuclear reactor setups. Every feature can be enabled/disabled seperately. Contains following items: decontamination foam - use to extinguish fires (compatible with Flammable Oils, RealisticReactors) and remove radiation; radiation protection suit - reduces radiation damage by 90%, also has good resistances against poison and acid (but breaks fast); heat switch (beta) - automatically stop heat from being distributed to heat up reactors to their optimal temperature; underground heat pipe (experimental) - construct an underground heat pipe network to distribute heat to connect reactors for the neighbour bonus.
